reviews.text: My wife gave me a gift certificate for dinner at Rooh as a Valentine's day present; we just redeemed it, for my birthday dinner, togetherwith four friends....

I just have one pic that I took because I was so disappointed I didn't even take pics of the food.

I got to try a few dishes here- I like fusion Indian places because they have creative twists on typical foods.
